item.title: H-E-B Recalls Sauté Pans Due to Laceration Hazard
item.description: The glass lid can crack or shatter during normal use, posing a laceration hazard.

item.title: HP Expands Recall of Batteries for Notebook Computers and Mobile Workstations Due to Fire and Burn Hazards
item.description: The lithium-ion batteries can overheat, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: TJX Recalls Heating Pads Due to Fire and Burn Hazards; Sold Exclusively at T.J. Maxx and Marshalls Stores
item.description: The heating pads can overheat during use, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: Arctic Cat Recalls Textron Off-Highway Utility Vehicles Due to Fuel Leak and Fire Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: Fuel can leak from the fuel line, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Arctic Cat Recalls Textron Off-Highway Utility Vehicles Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The lower front suspension arm can fail, posing a crash hazard.

item.title: Clinical Resolution Laboratory Recalls Topical Anesthetic Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Closure Requirement; Risk of Poisoning
item.description: The packaging is not child resistant as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act. The pain relieving cream contains lidocaine, posing a risk of poisoning to young children if they put it on their skin or ingest it.

item.title: Biotouch Recalls Topical Anesthetic Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Closure Requirement; Risk of Poisoning
item.description: The package is not child resistant as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act. The pain relieving gel contains lidocaine, posing a risk of poisoning to young children.

item.title: Harbor Freight Tools Recalls Propane Torches Due to Burn Hazard
item.description: The trigger on the torches that engages the flame can fail to disengage when the trigger is no longer pressed, posing a burn hazard.

item.title: Harbor Freight Tools Recalls 12V Rechargeable Flashlights Due to Overheating and Burn Hazards
item.description: The flashlight can overheat while charging, posing a burn hazard to consumers.

item.title: D&D Futon Furniture Recalls Sleeper Chair Folding Foam Beds Due to Violation of Federal Mattress Flammability Standard
item.description: The mattress fails to meet the mandatory federal flammability standard for mattresses, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: JumpSport Recalls Mini Trampolines Due to Injury Hazard; New Instructions and Warning Labels Provided
item.description: The folding trampoline’s frame can forcefully hit the user, posing an injury hazard.

item.title: Shearwater Recalls Diving Transmitters Due to Drowning Hazard
item.description: The transmitters can fail to signal the tank pressure due to interference while using two transmitters in the same dive. This poses a drowning hazard to divers.

item.title: SRAM Recalls Bicycle Gear Hubs Due to Crash and Injury Hazards
item.description: The brakes in the gear hubs can fail, posing crash and injury hazards to the rider.

item.title: Crate and Barrel Recalls Holiday Milk Bottles Due To Laceration Hazard
Academy Sports + Outdoors Recalls Turkey Fryer Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The turkey fryer spout can leak oil, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: CVB Recalls LUCID Folding Mattress-Sofas Due to Violation of Federal Mattress Flammability Standard
item.description: The mattresses fail to meet the mandatory federal flammability standard for mattresses, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: PurpleAir Recalls Power Supply Units for Air Sensors Due to Fire and Burn Hazards
item.description: The power supplies can overheat, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: Shop LC Recalls Disco Ball LED Light Due to Burn and Fire Hazards (Recall Alert)
item.description: The battery can overheat while charging, posing burn and fire hazards.

item.title: Target Recalls Toddler Boots Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: The unicorn horn on the boot can detach, posing a choking hazard to children.

item.title: Delta Electronics Recalls Solar Inverters Due to Fire and Impact Hazards
item.description: The capacitors can fail and allow heat to build up and the cover can eject with force from the unit, posing fire and impact hazards.

item.title: Dell Recalls Hybrid Power Adapters Sold with Power Banks Due to Shock Hazard
item.description: The hybrid power adapter casing can break and detach, exposing the internal metal components, posing an electric shock hazard.

item.title: Fisher-Price Recalls Children’s Power Wheels Barbie Campers Due to Injury Hazard
item.description: The children’s ride-on Power Wheels can continue to run after the foot pedal is released, posing an injury hazard.

item.title: DeWALT Recalls Drills Due to Shock Hazard
item.description: The drill’s wiring can contact internal moving parts, posing a shock hazard.

item.title: Hot Mom Recalls Bed Rails Due to Violation of Federal Standard for Portable Bed Rails: Sold Exclusively on Amazon.com (Recall Alert)
item.description: The bed rails fail to meet the federal mandatory standard for portable bed rails, posing entrapment and suffocation hazards to young children.

item.title: Navien Recalls Tankless Water Heaters and Boilers Due to Risk of Carbon Monoxide Poisoning
item.description: A kit installed on the tankless water heaters and boilers to convert them from natural gas to propane can cause the unit to produce excessive amounts of carbon monoxide, posing a risk of carbon monoxide poisoning to consumers.

item.title: Miles Industries Recalls Gas Fireplaces Due to Burn Hazard
item.description: The trim around the fireplaces can leak hot exhaust air, posing a burn hazard.

item.title: Women’s Iron Complete Supplements Recalled by GNC Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Closure Requirement; Risk of Poisoning
item.description: The dietary supplement blister packaging is not child resistant, as required by federal law. If ingested by a child, these supplements could cause serious injury or death.

item.title: Manhattan Toy Recalls Children’s Books Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: A metal grommet used to attach a fabric flap to a page in the book can detach, posing a choking hazard to young children.

item.title: TerraTrike Recalls Adult Tricycles Due to Crash and Injury Hazards
item.description: The torque sensor in the wheel can activate unexpectedly and cause the trike to power forward, posing crash and injury hazards.

item.title: The Children’s Place Recalls Infant Snowsuits Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: The metal snaps on the snowsuit can detach, posing a choking hazard to young children.

item.title: TJX Recalls Drawer Knobs Due to Laceration Hazard; Sold at T.J. Maxx, Marshalls, and HomeGoods Stores
item.description: The glass and ceramic drawer knobs can break or shatter when pulled, posing a laceration hazard

item.title: Lotus Foods Recalls Ramen Noodle Soup Cups Due to Fire and Burn Hazards
item.description: The paper soup cup’s labeling incorrectly instructs consumers to use the microwave for cooking, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: Women’s Scarves Recalled by Raj Imports Due to Violation of Federal Flammability Standard
item.description: The women’s scarves fail to meet the federal flammability standard for clothing textiles, posing a risk of burn injuries to consumers.

item.title: The Company Store Recalls Children’s Robes Due to Violation of Federal Flammability Standards (Recall Alert)
item.description: The children’s robes fail to meet the federal flammability standard for children’s sleepwear, posing a risk of burn injuries to children.

item.title: dormakaba USA Recalls Stanley Commercial Hardware Locksets Due to Risk of Entrapment in an Emergency
item.description: The lockset can fail to open, posing an entrapment hazard and inability to vacate a location in an emergency.

item.title: White-Rodgers Recalls Thermostats Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: Contact between the thermostat wires and household line voltage can damage the thermostat, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Kubota Recalls Zero Turn Mowers Due to Injury Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The rollover protective structure (ROPS) on the mower can loosen and fail to protect the operator in a rollover accident, posing a risk of injury.

item.title: Penn State Industries Recalls Woodworking Jaw Chuck Systems Due to Laceration Hazard
item.description: The jaws can loosen from the chuck and break off, posing a laceration hazard.

item.title: Skip Hop Recalls Convertible High Chairs Due to Injury and Fall Hazards
item.description: The legs on the highchair can detach from the seat, posing fall and injury hazards to children.

item.title: Kawasaki USA Recalls Off-Highway Utility Vehicles Due to Injury Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The vehicle’s rollover protection structure (ROPS) can fail to protect consumers, posing an injury hazard.
